subject: feat: add data-embed-id attributes and embedding docs
body:
Add data-embed-id attributes to all 13 embeddable chart/visualization
containers across 6 tab files, enabling individual elements to be
targeted for embedding in external apps (e.g., CV sites via iframe).

Created EMBED_REFERENCE.md (chart ID catalog with types, tabs, and
CV recommendations) and EMBED_IMPLEMENTATION.md (implementation plan
for URL-based embed mode via ?embed=<chart-id>).

No runtime behavior changes â€” groundwork for embed feature.

https://claude.ai/code/session_01FQWKFpGxdXJth6d6oA8E8S
title: add data-embed-id attributes and embedding docs
